sections.heading: This Act may be cited as the Gulf War Veterans Act.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Gulf War Veterans Act.

sections.heading: Gulf War Veterans Memorial.
sections.text:
A Gulf War Veterans Memorial may
be constructed by a private entity on a portion of the State property in Oak
Ridge Cemetery in Springfield, Illinois.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
